description:
Pierre is from Russia, and he certainly has that Russian look to him. I think he is a ringer for many of the Olympic gymnasts that I always thought should be porn stars.
He's new to English, but boy, you would never know it. He's got degrees in languages apparently.
I knew he'd done a solo elsewhere, so I was trying make the interview a bit different. His Russian accent was charming, but instead of relying on it, I had him answer all the question in Russian. So this vid has captioning!
This also marks my first "2-4-2sday" with two solos airing. Add
Caleb
in to the mix, and we've got two amazing uncut cocks. Skin lovers should be super happy!
title: Pierre - Solo
